about-levels-page.description: Genesis level shows the experience and reliability of the Manager

sections.section-1: Let's take a moment to talk about the level system. We will now share the parameters of the system, but please keep in mind, that these parameters are subject to change and are relevant only for the time of the Alpha version. Only emphasizes that there is a deep curiosity in all humans about nature and astronomy, even if many people would not know to call it astronomy.,
sections.section-2: Astronomy is one of the oldest sciences of all time. When archeologists unearth ancient civilizations, even as far back as the cavemen, they invariably find art that shows mans unquenchable fascination with the stars. To this day, you can easily get an animated discussion at any gathering on the topic of “Is there intelligent life on other planets?”
sections.section-age: stands for the lifetime of a manager account. During the Alpha it will be counted as days, so you will need to have your investment program running for at least two days to have a third level.
sections.section-avg-profit: means an average profit that is made daily. So if you want to reach the second level, you would need to achieve at least 0.5% of an average daily gain.
sections.section-total-profit: is calculated in USD. It shows how much USD you would need to make per day on an average basis.
sections.section-6: A manager would need to achieve all three parameters to receive the next level of his investment program. You can also skip levels if you outperform them.

description.disable-reallocation-message: The next reallocation will be available on
description.withdraw-notice-text: You can withdraw only the invested funds, the profit will be withdrawn to your account at the end of the period automatically

close-period.title: Close Period
close-period.body: Do you really want to restart current period?
close-period.notification-success: Request to close the period was sent successfully.

description.withdraw-notice-text: You can withdraw only the invested funds, the profit will be withdrawn to your account at the end of the period automatically
description.close-program-notification: Investment program will be closed after this reporting period. Current investment requests will be cancelled and new requests won’t be accepted. Profit and funds from the trading account will be deposited to GVT wallets of investors and manager according to their shares.
description.close-program-notification-success: Request to close the program was sent successfully.

popover.text: Genesis level shows the experience and reliability of the Manager

2fa-page.title: Two-factor authentication
2fa-page.enter-code: Enter the 6-digit code it gives you here to activate:
2fa-page.alt-code: Or enter this secret key into your Google Authenticator device:

disable.title: Disable two-factor authentication
disable.success: You have successfully disabled the two factor authentication. However, we strongly recommend you keep it enabled. This can protect your funds from being stolen.

codes.copy-success: Recovery codes was copied to the clipboard successfully.
codes.copy-error: Failed to copy data to the clipboard.
codes.title: Please read carefully
codes.successfully: You have just successfully configured the two factor authentication. We will ask you for the 2FA Code in any potentially dangerous situation, such as logging in or withdrawing funds.
codes.recovery_codes: You can find your recovery codes below. You can use them in case you lost your 2FA key or lost your phone with the 2FA application installed. Each recovery code can be used only once. Save these codes on paper and put it in a safe place. If you are not sure that you can provide a secure place for the recovery codes, it would be safier to just ignore these codes.
codes.warning: WARNING: We do not store your recovery codes. If you lost the access to your 2FA, it is most likely that we couldn't help you to return the access to your account.

email-confirm.title: Email confirm
email-confirm.error-during-confirmation: An error occurred during confirmation of email:

0.quote: An investor without investment objectives is like a traveler without a destination.
0.author: Ralph Seger

1.quote: Sometimes your best investments are the ones you don't make.
1.author: Donald Trump

2.quote: Never depend on a single income, make an investment to create a second source.
2.author: Warren Buffet

3.quote: Put not your trust in money, but put your money in trust.
3.author: Oliver Wendell Holmes

4.quote: Never stop investing. Never stop improving. Never stop doing something new.
4.author: Bob Parsons

5.quote: When you invest you are buying a day that you don't have to work.
5.author: Aya Laraya

get-started.title: Get started
get-started.text-2: Find the program or the fund to invest or make a deposit first

empty-events.text: The following events will be displayed here

0.quote: Rule No. 1: Never lose money. Rule No. 2: Never forget rule No.1
0.author: Warren Buffet

1.quote: Successful investing is about managing risk, not avoiding it.
1.author: Benjamin Graham

2.quote: Money is always eager and ready to work for anyone who is ready to employ it.
2.author: Idowu Koyenikan

3.quote: Investing isn’t about beating others at their game. It’s about controlling yourself at your own game.
3.author: Benjamin Graham

4.quote: The greatest investment we can ever make is to invest our life in the life of someone else.
4.author: Scott Lee

5.quote: In any investment, you expect to have fun and make money.
5.author: Michael Jordan
